name: CategoryTheory.Functor.Linear.map_smul
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝⁷ : Semiring R
C : Type u_2
D : Type u_3
inst✝⁶ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} C
inst✝⁵ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_5, u_3} D
inst✝⁴ : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Preadditive D
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Linear R C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Linear R D
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst✝ : F.Additive
self : CategoryTheory.Functor.Linear R F
X Y : C
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
r : R
⊢ Eq (F.map (HSMul.hSMul r f)) (HSMul.hSMul r (F.map f))
decl:
/-- An additive functor `F` is `R`-linear provided `F.map` is an `R`-module morphism. -/
class Functor.Linear {C D : Type*} [Category C] [Category D] [Preadditive C] [Preadditive D]
  [Linear R C] [Linear R D] (F : C ⥤ D) [F.Additive] : Prop where
  /-- the functor induces a linear map on morphisms -/
  map_smul : ∀ {X Y : C} (f : X ⟶ Y) (r : R), F.map (r • f) = r • F.map f := by aesop_cat

name: CategoryTheory.Functor.map_smul
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝⁸ : Semiring R
C : Type u_2
D : Type u_3
inst✝⁷ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} C
inst✝⁶ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_5, u_3} D
inst✝⁵ : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
inst✝⁴ : CategoryTheory.Preadditive D
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Linear R C
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Linear R D
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst✝¹ : F.Additive
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Functor.Linear R F
X Y : C
r : R
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
⊢ Eq (F.map (HSMul.hSMul r f)) (HSMul.hSMul r (F.map f))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem map_smul {X Y : C} (r : R) (f : X ⟶ Y) : F.map (r • f) = r • F.map f :=
  Functor.Linear.map_smul _ _

name: CategoryTheory.Functor.map_units_smul
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝⁸ : Semiring R
C : Type u_2
D : Type u_3
inst✝⁷ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} C
inst✝⁶ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_5, u_3} D
inst✝⁵ : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
inst✝⁴ : CategoryTheory.Preadditive D
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Linear R C
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Linear R D
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst✝¹ : F.Additive
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Functor.Linear R F
X Y : C
r : Units R
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
⊢ Eq (F.map (HSMul.hSMul r f)) (HSMul.hSMul r (F.map f))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem map_units_smul {X Y : C} (r : Rˣ) (f : X ⟶ Y) : F.map (r • f) = r • F.map f := by
  apply map_smul

decl: theorem coe_mapLinearMap {X Y : C} : ⇑(F.mapLinearMap R : (X ⟶ Y) →ₗ[R] _) = F.map := rfl

name: CategoryTheory.Functor.natLinear
initialProofState:
C : Type u_2
D : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} C
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_5, u_3} D
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Preadditive D
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst✝ : F.Additive
⊢ CategoryTheory.Functor.Linear Nat F
decl:
instance natLinear : F.Linear ℕ where
  map_smul := F.mapAddHom.map_nsmul

name: CategoryTheory.Functor.intLinear
initialProofState:
C : Type u_2
D : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} C

decl:
instance intLinear : F.Linear ℤ where
  map_smul f r := F.mapAddHom.map_zsmul f r

name: CategoryTheory.Functor.ratLinear
initialProofState:

D : Type u_3

inst✝² : F.Additive
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Linear Rat C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Linear Rat D
⊢ CategoryTheory.Functor.Linear Rat F
decl:
instance ratLinear : F.Linear ℚ where
  map_smul f r := F.mapAddHom.toRatLinearMap.map_smul r f

name: CategoryTheory.Equivalence.inverseLinear
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝⁸ : Semiring R
C : Type u_2
D : Type u_3
inst✝⁷ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} C
inst✝⁶ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_5, u_3} D
inst✝⁵ : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
inst✝⁴ : CategoryTheory.Linear R C
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Preadditive D
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Linear R D
e : CategoryTheory.Equivalence C D
inst✝¹ : e.functor.Additive
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Functor.Linear R e.functor
⊢ CategoryTheory.Functor.Linear R e.inverse
decl:
instance inverseLinear (e : C ≌ D) [e.functor.Additive] [e.functor.Linear R] :
  e.inverse.Linear R where
    map_smul r f := by
      apply e.functor.map_injective
      simp
